Uses of Interface
edu.rit.crypto.StreamCipher

  • Packages that use StreamCipher 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.crypto
    Package edu.rit.crypto contains implementations of cryptographic algorithms.

    • Uses of StreamCipher in edu.rit.crypto

      Classes in edu.rit.crypto that implement StreamCipher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RC4
      Class RC4 provides an object that computes the RC4 stream cipher.
      Constructors in edu.rit.crypto with parameters of type StreamCipher 
      Constructor and Description
      CipherInputStream(InputStream in, StreamCipher cipher)
      Construct a new cipher input stream.
      CipherOutputStream(OutputStream out, StreamCipher cipher)
      Construct a new cipher output stream.
